goal.title: Software Developer & Project Manager

goal.subtitle1Text: It is important for companies to be reactive in this fast modern world ğŸŒ. goal.subtitle2Text: It happens frequently that teams are under pressure with an important amount of workload ğŸ—ƒï¸. Softwares can automate some taks in order to save time, be more efficient and allocate time to more complex tasks. ğŸ” I like to audit processes and search which IT tool I can implement to help teams in their daily tasks.
goal.subtitle3Text: Nowadays, we receive thousands of data in a week ğŸ”¢. I like to get revelant information from this data to help teams to take decision with for instance KPI indicators. IA can be from a great tool also to assist to take decision ğŸ¤–.
